meta.author: Sean Wilkinson
meta.sampleQuery: USE "https://bitbucket.org/wilkinson/qmachine/raw/gh-pages/qm.proxy.xml"; SELECT * FROM qm.proxy WHERE url="https://www.qmachine.org/q.js";
